Building and maintaining strong relationships with your team members is key to fostering a positive work environment. Regular check-ins, open communication, and active listening can go a long way in building trust and collaboration. Additionally, recognizing and acknowledging individual and team achievements can boost motivation. Remember to lead by example and show empathy towards your team members.
